name: ASTERELIS Demo
detailed_description:
WELCOME TO THE END OF THE WORLD

Oof that's a really negative way of starting things. Truth is, it’s only about to be the end of the world. As the last Champion of The Heavenly Mother, Graelune, you have the power to save us all. You can lead the last settlement on earth to salvation, and defeat the wicked witch, Tatsuki...

…Or I guess you could help her plunge this planet into eternal darkness, and become God of the New World.

In ASTERELIS, an RPG about love, cat-hamster hybrids, and the meaning of life, it's up to you.

STAY TUNED FOR THE UPCOMING KICKSTARTER CAMPAIGN. MORE INFORMATION ON THE ASTERELIS OFFICIAL WEBSITE.

FEATURES

  • Choices matter. Will you aid humanity’s last survivors, or cast them aside in your pursuit of power?
  • Stab whacky monsters with the unique, stabbing-based combat system.
  • A fun, colorful cast of characters for you to befriend/forsake.
  • An original and kind of good soundtrack
  • Something about flipping coins?
  • ARE THEY CATS OR ARE THEY HAMSTERS!?
  • DOESN’T MATTER; THEY HAVE KNIVES.
  • Multiple endings.
